District 2
==========

![Councilmember Kenny Green profile photo](https://www.cityofmesquite.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=29752 "Councilmember Kenny Green profile photo")

1. **Kenny Green**  
   **Mayor Pro Tem**  
   **Councilmember, District 2**  
   Current Term Expires: November 2027  
   [Email District 2](mailto:district2@cityofmesquite.com)

   Ph: 469-999-5056

   **Mailing Address**  
   City of Mesquite  
   P.O. Box 850137  
   Mesquite, TX 75185-0137

About Kenny Green
=================

Occupation
----------

* Insurance Analyst

Personal
--------

* Spouse: Stephanie
* Children: Makayla - Stepdaughter
* Grandchildren: Janada, Loyalty

Education
---------

* Attended Townview Magnet Center High School (Dallas, TX)
* Pursuing Business Degree from Upper Iowa University

City of Mesquite
----------------

* City Councilmember: 2019 – Present
* Alcott Logistics Station Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 14
* Gus Thomasson Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 8
* Heartland Town Center Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 11
* IH-20 Business Park Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 12
* Mesquite Health Facilities Development Corporation
* Mesquite Housing Finance Corporation
* Mesquite Industrial Development Corporation
* Polo Ridge Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 10
* Rodeo City Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 1
* Skyline Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 7
* Spradley Farms Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 13
* Town East/Skyline Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 9
* Towne Centre Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 2

Recognitions
------------

* Awarded TASB Media Honor Roll
